title: Very Very Lag Drop
body:
Since the New client , im laging hard in almost all the Team Fights , i dont know what i should do ://
Can some one help me adding on some networks?

Thank You Alot

replies.body: I've edited your post for privacy reasons.  We need to know for sure if this freezing is a result of packet loss or fps issues.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the impacted matches, and let me know the results.

Its FPS insue ... but i have the minium requesit for playing i have put the game on performance ... i guess i have made everything ! But its just not making any diference :/ The think is ! In that "Log Reader" its says  "NETWORK DIAGNOSTIC OVERALL RATING: PING ISSUES" But 75 its my normal ping for portugal ! ://

Gotcha, thanks for clearing that up!  In that case, you can still see drops in frames if your drivers are out of date or game files become corrupt.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for this specific issue to tune things up and make sure your game files are healthy.  I hope that helps!
i have done that already :/ but didnt chance anything

Bummer!  No worries, though, we can take a deeper look with you directly.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will review your issue and find some options for you!
Where i can put the logs ? in the supp ticket?
Yup!  You'll be able to add attachments through the ticketing center.
i cant send them a ticket :& , i cant even log in ://
ok i already send it , now im w8ing , u know the estimated time that i will w8?
